contentfulBlogPost.title: [Event] Stress Management and how to take care of yourself

childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: People always aim for the job they love, but how much can you handle the stress it brings? STOP! Listen to your own body, your health and…

childMarkdownRemark.html:
There was an old saying: “Choose a job you love, and you’ll never work a day in your life”. That was always the ideal state of work-life balance, but in reality there is always a certain amount of stress, no matter your passion for the role you have. And when it reaches a high level and becomes chronic, it can be overwhelming and cause physical and emotional damages to you and your entire well-being.

It might seems like a dead-end and there’s nothing you can do. But fear not, you have a lot more control than you might think!

Join us at our next event Stress Management and how to take care of yourself, presented by our lovely community member Hannah La. Hannah will share her experience about how she manage the tremendous stress while studying and working and maintain a healthy work-life balance during uni.

[Event] Stress Management

And how to take care of yourself

Speaker: Hannah La - Associate Software Engineer @ Domino’s Pty Ltd.

Date: Sat, 03/07/2021

Time: 6:30 PM AEST

Registration Link: EventBrite

If you need to discuss or need any updates, please feel free to join our facebook group Vietnamese Aussies in IT and our Discord server at VAIT - Vietnamese Aussies in IT Discord Server. See you there!
